extension.description: Subscene.com provides subtitles in more than 50 languages for TV-Series, Movies, and Music videos, phrase by phrase curated and perfected by users.[CR][CR]Note: Needs kodi-vfs-rar and/or kodi-vfs-libarchive addon to extract rar files.
